name: AnyList
headline: One app for stress-free shopping, cooking, and meal planning.
description: AnyList is the best way to create and share grocery shopping lists. Easily share a list with your spouse or roommates. List changes show up instantly on everyone’s iOS or Android device.

## One app for stress-free shopping, cooking, and meal planning.
[ ![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/hero_download.png?v=89eb2f408dcbf5275ad2d1030e01c14ad1d38879b0afec438049c6e69d4034dd607a4dfa87f0502d39e31ac97c0b0f1a96b151d259b83ea2674d1c233f5a25e5) ](https://www.anylist.com/<https:/geo.itunes.apple.com/us/app/anylist-grocery-shopping-list/id522167641?mt=8&at=1000lmUx>) [ ![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/google-play-badge.png?v=736dd01f4f0da79692b936d988507dcc5cfc3f4210714500594be4f9debd565e0228d856938965cf8aa5a56aceca12dd0423da98b717ea68f7eeb36007e5331c) ](https://www.anylist.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.purplecover.anylist>)
![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/hero_iphone.png?v=0cd201672f7e74e67d58bf987373e15b3241f673a8f06b6e0a62ad97d4e2d7ef45bca18d13f6e8fcb2ffeca1ed779d915f41453fb2c64dcd14d1c149781fb6e8)
[](https://www.anylist.com/<#lists>)
# Create and Share Lists
![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/devices/lists_iphone.png?v=bf0bb0524a5116fd1d32913e483c1923fb397ac8fe63f7af7ce001993edce2bb1dda87bd635c11f772b4b94b3e577c5c91d0f2ebe54be2f58f168dad99b59de9)
![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/lists_icons_addcross.png?v=c9a6116052f27aa93eccbf72f5d86804acf3eab7a161c46851a93c6f88b9fd9bfce940d2cff3f6cae18d182bd8d4c1c1df470ba25fd3995eae9c930acc520357) | 
### Quickly Create Organized Lists  
---|---  
AnyList suggests common items as you type, and automatically groups items by category to help save time at the store.  
![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/lists_icons_multiple.png?v=b7ad58f69660e950c3d87c05829d2dd5413b4ec679ce589878aa7785c545c898cbeb0a4bccd307ab7c3b3a64a97def3363c80beb3afe17c31cc0f40009cd4f81) | 
### Easily Share Lists  
---|---  
Stay in sync with family and friends by sharing a list with them. Any changes made to a shared list will show up instantly to everyone sharing the list.  
![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/lists_icons_voice.png?v=0ae1a4fcb43ff723ac3110466b67edf0d03b3022695384ab28660dcde9592b6ab4af06fd2c6fcff8e92286c367064424fb245a1c36bc7e9873ce58bd95b7a4cc) | 
### Add Items With Siri  
---|---  
Use your voice to add items to AnyList via Siri, so you never forget to buy something you need.  
[ Learn More About Lists  ](https://www.anylist.com/</lists>)
# Collect and Organize Recipes
![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/devices/recipes_ipad.png?v=cb139845748ace9877ed2bcff34b5d88b8b460be652f4faf81124dbc49bd953a4fa5407931a1dbe0ca8d0c01658af4c7ad915efebf3f7fb1ce0ff38eec85e320)
![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/recipes_icons_yours.png?v=064ab1518518346e014a947e71f02306889287ee5d6da095eba03ae2bd7f1cd8ba9b0b4465b4c01614c984d491eff39d43fc3ca9def0a0094e183a57dff23133) | 
### Organize Your Recipes  
---|---  
AnyList helps you organize your personal recipes and allows you to easily add recipes from other sources, like email messages and popular websites and blogs.  
![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/recipes_icons_lists.png?v=dbf712b22ffd529ab8ab3682aab20f2ab9ede4fe315737b074d04b7ea56b88c733c181f04b5283255faa41b7b404fca07afd485130c83cab7b7689207b337fbd) | 
### Plan Your Shopping  
---|---  
Simply tap on ingredients to add them to your shopping list, or plan for an entire week or month with our meal planning calendar.  
[ Learn More About Recipes  ](https://www.anylist.com/</recipes>)
# Unlock the Full Power of AnyList
![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/webapp@2x.png?v=91ff4a4768503053a510d4de42958e413e36d85cfd098fe5f41df0f0cb4661cf9c7d73749c3f1106e04e676e3e253855f1393d60f281cd54251b8c389298e1c9)
### AnyList for Mac & PC
Use our Mac and web apps to access AnyList from your Mac or PC. Changes are instantly synced with your iPhone and iPad.
![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/recipe_import@2x.png?v=a9e6944990db2994057d0927dcb2663f769a74cb99fcd4db36115b8777c32afafa771d11d92bb27e54309b2775cd446b876aa82ffcc9ec6abedee67561203e88)
### Recipe Web Import
Save recipes from popular websites and blogs directly into AnyList from your web browser on iOS, Mac, or PC.
![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/meal_calendar@2x.png?v=881e6706e8befd3fd033c4d3c91793da1390b7dbcb3b08112db25adf032f2a8d19c630130c87fa8182b8f2c3901dda0949fabb0edf887c6208046496fb8ad932)
### Meal Planning
Plan your meals for the coming weeks on a calendar, then easily add ingredients for upcoming recipes to your shopping list.
![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/item_photos@2x.png?v=3d3b5f6ec17e452f3feb91c6f63295be529f608ae74a482d18df19982e8fc6d89f496b22dd485f7cd9c6b2c719f5610a49b7bd864a9bfe8486bdcfaaa9c06f0c)
### Item Photos
Add photos to list items to keep everyone on the same page and make sure the right item is purchased.
![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/themes@2x.png?v=0ad23d070e1de9c74d2128a26251952593dce60dbc02e2845f93ff735628b58bab9e3039ca105b8c69643da443b8136a85e6fd0916679c0c19e10fcda78c2919)
### Themes
Show your style by customizing the look of your lists with multiple fonts, colors, and textures.
![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/folders@2x.png?v=883fdc8aad95c25a973e0d4909ae87fb2c85b8fd6c32ad10d8ddcc35c0748fe66f0ef7f19288335c171018d286c86be206786f6a736715e2d4e538bed6ed132b)
### List Folders
Stay organized by creating folders to group related lists.
[ Learn More About AnyList Complete  ](https://www.anylist.com/</complete>)
> AnyList makes shared grocery lists simple and intuitive.
![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/testimonials-lifehacker.png?v=841eacbc8b2bbd4243a9003f09269dd7f20b08e235fda7f852eff3368f2577bc65d4390e8261ffba378149b9ebc94ff4d29e8891f65d8db2a4c8462210b9bf7e)

![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/testimonials-appstorm.png?v=0b0ddb70aef1d5e8ef472f2eb9a86db32594c14089a721d93c74e45f3e929d88a97dbdf15c5020609ab1e5567945a05c19f0d250705e76493c8cf252a9d8d5d9)
> I don’t recommend going to the grocery store without it.
![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/testimonials-tip.png?v=07948235260cff1e82aba2bd23b4c1f5e7329cea249bf54b93ee8fda07fa4765ff8933e5a80ab235245e29824c4fecf4d4ec74c0b5945bc8f8cf616ebae61ff3)
![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/footer_appicon.png?v=9c0d9e57d1b631380f81a97b10db6193db86c0f08dc8ac1734671322caba36a1319a6f9729aa7f1a18cadbb69cfc255fe88727835a3adc5fc3cfa80c6d77c80a)

![](https://www.anylist.com/static/website/images/footer_devices.png?v=56ae382dfa330b11d8966b0fb41b80501fd5f1651a3ae6370a82c45380a9245b33f7516e88aa5633cdc0a47ed16daea29822ec40ad6b7e67adae1ff8172da4b2)

generated_description:
### AnyList: Streamlining Your Shopping and Cooking Experience

**Company Overview:**
Founded in 2010 and based in Missoula, MT, AnyList is a small yet impactful startup that's a proud member of Y Combinator's Summer 2010 batch. With a dedicated team of just two employees, it strives to simplify the often chaotic tasks of grocery shopping, cooking, and meal planning through its intuitive app.

**Mission Statement:**
AnyList’s mission is straightforward: to provide one comprehensive app that enables stress-free shopping, cooking, and meal planning.

**What They Offer:**
Initially, AnyList was heralded as the best way to create and share grocery shopping lists. It allows users to easily share lists with family or friends, ensuring updates are instantly visible on both iOS and Android devices. Over the years, AnyList has expanded its functionality to encompass more than just grocery lists. Users can now also:

- Create **organized shopping lists** that remember common items and automatically categorize them for efficiency.
- **Share lists** in real-time, so you never miss out on what someone has added or removed.
- **Organize recipes** and create a personal digital cookbook, allowing for seamless meal planning.
- Use Siri to add items by voice, keeping your hands free and your mind focused.

With its premium features, users can unlock additional functionalities such as meal planning calendars, item photos for clarity, and themed list appearances.

**Market Position and Tags:**
AnyList operates in the intersection of e-commerce and food & beverage, carving out a niche in the realm of grocery list and meal planning apps. 

**Current Status:**
With a lean team and an emphasis on versatile features, AnyList continues to evolve and cater to the needs of modern shoppers. Their commitment is evident not only in user-friendly design but also in enhancing the cooking experience, reducing the cognitive load that comes with meal planning and groceries.

To dive deeper into their offerings or to download the app, you can visit their website: [AnyList](https://www.anylist.com). 

Whether you're looking to streamline your shopping trips or organize your culinary adventures, AnyList is here to help keep things organized and stress-free.
